channel.title: Blog on Patrick Lau | AI & Automation Leadership
channel.description: Recent content in Blog on Patrick Lau | AI & Automation Leadership

item.title: Implementing the EU AI Act: Lessons from the Frontlines
item.description: Practical insights from translating EU AI Act requirements into actionable technical controls and operating processes for a global financial institution.

item.title: From Infrastructure to AI: Reflections on 20 Years in Tech
item.description: How two decades of building critical infrastructure prepared me for leading AI strategy in regulated environments.

item.title: The MLOps Maturity Gap: Why Most Organizations Struggle with Production AI
item.description: Most organizations can train models. Far fewer can deploy them reliably. Here’s what separates successful AI operations from struggling ones.

item.title: Building Trust in AI: Why Governance Isn't Optional
item.description: In the race to deploy AI, organizations that skip governance find themselves rebuilding from scratch. Here’s why getting it right from the start matters.
